oai_dc:dc.dc:title: discharge of Alfred Armstrong Adams
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge of Alfred Armstrong Adams, Co. E, 1st Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. Adams was an apothecary in Nashville, Tenn. Discharge is dated August 3, 1862 and is signed by Colonel James T. Wheeler. Adams was discharged due to a wound received on the withdrawal; from Shiloh. He was discharged at Guntown, Miss.
